text: Pholidobolus vertebralis, the brown pholiodobolus, is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is found in Panama, Ecuador, Colombia, and Peru. ==References== Category:Pholidobolus Category:Reptiles described in 1879 Category:Taxa named by Arthur William Edgar O'Shaughnessy
title: Pholidobolus vertebralis
